Dead by Daylight is a fantastic horror multiplayer experience that will keep you on your toes. Either you're playing the predator catching your prey or the prey trying to escape the predator-Dead by Daylight offers a wide variety of killers and survivors with unique skill sets to apply each trial. This horror experience will keep you playing with friends and other players worldwide for a long time. Death is not an escape!

Started playing last year during the yearly event. However, there are pros and cons to it.
Pros: Once you get better perks and more awareness on how loops have, you'll have more fun.
There's actually a reason to play and goal to even get better perks for your play style. 
Cons: The match making can be upsetting for people new to the game. If you just start off as killer, you'll probably get bullied a lot since more people have hours. 
If you're new to survivor, you'll probably get tunneled to death by the killer. 

Despite the ups and downs, I'd still recommend the game for anyone who look for fun on either side of the game. Find some friends you enjoy playing with and go in for laughs

Why is  it still so broken after 4 years, lets not even talk about balance. what is hit detection? BHVR has NO clue. Ten meters away? Behind the killer? around a corner and enjoying a nice cup of tea? None of it matters, you're going down. Then once you've been tunneled, Facecamped, BM'd, the other side will proceed to tell you how shit you are, because lets not forget how awful and toxic the community is. This game is trash, don't buy, don't play it, don't even look at it, BHVR doesn't deserve your money, or your time. Please don't buy this game.

EDIT: You know, At this point I thought I had experienced the worst of the worst this game had to offer. Then I played some more, because why not. I know it isn't new, but the matchmaking in this game just isn't. It doesn't exist, BHVR doesn't care. If you're solo que-ing your just as likely to get paired with Rank 20 survivors on their first game, as you are Rank 1 Sweat monsters. SOMETIMES BOTH AT THE SAME TIME. MAN THIS GAME IS STILL BAD, STILL DON'T BUY, STILL DON'T PLAY. Don't do it, it's not worth it.

Double Edit: I keep playing, I shouldn't and I don't know why I am.  BHVR is still too stubborn to fix a single issue in this game. Man, we know this game, and we know how unfixable the bugs are, don't you dare suggest we fix them. Basic accessibility issues? Well screw those people, we are never going to make our game more accessible. The message is clear, BHVR doesn't care about its player base, they already have your money, why would they ever fix any of the problems that plague this game.

Edith Febrero 2021: Lo terminaron de C4G4R. Mas dificil aún subir de rango de survivor. Mas ventajas para los killers, parece un chiste nose a quien leen los desarrolladores........

Si no lo arreglan rapido Chau DBD. Lo deje de jugar en Enero (junto a otros 4/5 amigos). Lo probe luego de la actualizacion, jugue las peores 3 partidas de mi vida. Me hizo enojar y lo cerré. Muy triste.

Ojala salga alguno parecido pero bien hecho, es buena la modalidad.

Reseña previa:
Cuando arranque a jugar me parecía un juego muy divertido, el objetivo era escapar o dont be dead by daylight. Una vez que empece a bajar de rango y la cosa se pone mas seria, ya empieza a tornarse aburrido. Es un juego muy pro killer, con habilidades que pueden marcar el desenlace de una partida antes de comenzar. Items como memento mori que el unico objetivo es hacer bajar de rango a los sobrevivientes porque ni el killer suma puntos al usarlo.

Se desconecta y te saca puntos, hice 0 púntos y me sacó 1 punto, bugs y errores que terminamos pagando con nuestro tiempo. 
Muchas ventajas para los asesinos y no tantas para los sobrevivientes, te dan habilidades como poder saltar y salir corriendo pero el killer salta atras mio y me pega en el aire con una precision increíble. O se teletransporta y pega a distancia,  pegan a una pared y te matan.

Hay killers que estan rotisimos, freddy, la enfermera, ghost face.

Hay partidas que no podemos reparar ni 1 generador y te saca puntos, y hay partidas donde reparamos todo rapido, escapamos y te saca puntos tambien......

Pareciera que quieren que seamos todos killers, ya que todas las ventajas están ahi.

만약 당신이 이 게임을 생존자로 시작하기로 했다면
살인마를 만나도 따돌릴 수 있는 존이 어딘지 몰라서 30초만에 눕습니다.
만약 우연히 따돌릴 존으로 가더라도 인코스, 심리전을 하는 방법을 몰라서 30초만에 눕습니다.
이후에는 터널링 당해서 3분 안에 엔티티님 곁으로 갈 것 입니다.

만약 당신이 이 게임을 살인마로 시작하기로 했다면
일단 반필수 DLC부터 구입하셔야 합니다.
구입하셨으면 20~30시간 투자하셔서 필수 전승 DLC캐릭터부터 30~40레벨까지 키우세요
키우셨다면 자기가 하고싶은 살인마를 전승퍽 3밥풀이 될때까지 블포를 박아주시면 됩니다.
전승퍽이 안나온다구요? 어쩌라고요 저도 힘들어요

살인마를 처음 시작하시면 저랭크에 서식중인 매크로 살인마들때문에 20~40분간 매칭이 잡히지 않을 겁니다.
이를 해결하기 위해서는 랭크를 올리셔야 합니다.
물론 매칭 시스템이 거지같기때문에 1랭 생존자 4명과 매칭될 수도 있습니다.
근데 털렸으면 당신이 못했으니까 강등되도록 하세요.

티배깅, 손전등 도발, 등 화가 나시나요?
살려달라고 애교부리는 생존자를 살려주고 EZ라는 채팅을 받았나요?
전략적으로 캠핑과 터널링을 하는게 맞는데 끝나고 생존자에게 욕을 먹었나요?
그냥 입닥치고 웃으세요. 당신은 광대니까

Played it daily after discovering it back in October, really found it a great, fun game despite all the bugs, awful updates that break the game, and overall nasty community. Made a lot of great friends and met a lot of cool streamers, but the most recent patch has turned a buggy, funny mess into a broken piece of shit. The new UI isn't the worst part of the update, although it isn't great, it's okay, and we'll get used to it. The movement, broken hit boxes, the sudden lack of being able to pip, or even safety pip, at red ranks due to a broken emblem system for survivors, makes it not worth playing right now.

He reeditado mi mensaje de valoración positiva anterior, ya que el ultimo parche termina de colmar el vaso. El asesino ya tiene un rango desorbitado, agarra a distancia, se mueve, incluso, más rápido que de costumbre. a parte, la forma de visualización de caracteres dentro del juego ha empeorado gravemente. Es cierto que si no hay superioridad por parte del asesino, nadie querría serlo y por lo tanto no se jugaría,pero si no hay supervivientes que jueguen, el asesino no tendrá nadie a quien colgar. El sistema de reportes es pésimo, los asesinos generan abuso sobre un único jugador, haciendo las partidas aburridas y toxicas, sin contar algún caso descarado de uso de cheats y no se aplica ningún tipo de castigo para estos. Dejare de jugar una temporada y ojala cambie.
It's fun solo or with friends, definitely recommend
sim

Behaviour has made some much needed changes and survivor meta's are finally changing thanks to some major perk balancing, amongst other needed changes such as the progression system which was a long time coming. Some bugs are fixed but new ones seem to appear after every bug patch, MMR SUCKS HANDS DOWN.

For that very reason, i wouldn't recommend this game for new players, it's just too difficult to get into unfortunately, i know ppl who have tried getting into the game but simply cannot because all they do is get dominated by the opposing side, again isn't good for noobs.

I'm actually getting back into the game after about a month of inactivity, and i'm glad to say that i'm enjoying myself, so for those who left, consider coming back and if you haven't played before, stay away for your own sanity.

Just gotta hope Behaviour continues on this good streak, although i wouldn't hold ur breath.

Das Spiel ist super, allerdings wären ein paar Verbesserungen ganz gut;
1. Wenn Überlebende am Boden liegen sollte es die Möglichkeit geben sich wieder vollständig alleine heilen zu können denn wenn alle 4 am Boden liegen kann keiner mehr den anderen heilen und wenn dann der Killer psychotisch spielt wird das Spiel unnötig in die länge gezogen (Schach Matt).
2. Man sollte zusammen spielen können und die Wahl dabei haben den Killer oder überlebenden zu spielen.
3, Wartezeit dauert viel zu lange

Who are you? Survivor? Killer? A little of both? They call the game survival horror, but I think it's more than that. This game and how we play it is a manifestation of our primal instincts. Are you the type of person that focuses on [b]Objectives[/b] to work towards escape? Maybe you're more the more [b]Altruistic[/b] type that heals other survivors when they're wounded and/or rescue them from hooks? Perhaps {b}Boldness[/b] is your [i]forte[/i] as you distract the killer, disarm their traps, drop palates on them and stay just out of reach while chased? Is [b]Survival[/b] your #1 priority and you'll do what ever it takes to not be seen while you lend a hand where you can. Your role may vary from match to match, but when the gates are powered and opened do you maintain that role? Do you help others survivors escape too or is it everyone for themselves at that point? Some situations seem hopeless while others find a way, but the true character of a player always bubbles to the surface.

Killers are a bit more simple and direct. Do you want the players to work harder to complete their tasks as you play the role of a relentless [b]Hunter[/b]? Totally dominate them as you wound each one and break generators in a display a sheer [b]Brutality[/b]? Use your power in ways to lure survivors out into the open or find where they hide and down them with sinister [b]Deviousness[/b]? Is the [b]Sacrifice[/b] all you care about and one by one you hook survivors until the entity takes them or meet the conditions to kill them by your own hand? Do you [u]respect the 4% when a survivor gets themselves off a hook after they've been left behind[/u]? Will you show mercy to a good survivor that had bad teammates that you made short work of? There's always a choice to be made and those choices all have an effect on how the match ends. The perk says [b]No One Escapes Death[/b], but in the end [b]Death is not an escape[/b].

çok övdüler. İlk bi katil girdim fena değildi ama kendimi fazla avantajlı hissettim açıkcası özellikle görev veya kanca başında beklemedim kovalaması bol oldu. Sonra arkadaşlarla girip bir kaç el survivor oynayalım dedik. Tek eğlenen camp yapan katil. şanslıysanız bir iki motoru ellersiniz.  mapler çok benzer, perkler yetersiz, level atlasanız ne olacak? Katil çeşitleri, oynanış tarzı , oyun akışı içindeki yeri, itemları, skinleri her şeyiyle daha eğlenceli. Neyse genel olarak dengesiz ve bitmemişlik var.  Korkunç veya eğlenceli değil abartıldığını düşünüyorum. Oynamazsanız kült bir oyunu kaçırmış olmazsınız. Bu tarzda daha keyifli başka oyunlar var (reklam yapmayayım şimdi)...
